ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds chicken wing pieces, drumettes and flats

cookingTips: Toss wings in glaze halfway through baking for even coating
Arrange wings on foil-lined sheet for easy cleanup
Broil for 2-3 minutes at the end to caramelize the glaze
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand the balance of sweet marmalade and chili heat, and explain when to apply glaze for best results.
